prora 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • prora: Unifying methods on gene set enrichment

plot cluster

plotK.Rd

plot cluster

plotK(scaledM, k, idx)

Arguments

scaledM

matrix with data
k

cluster assignment (same as nrow(scaledM))
idx

index of cluster

Examples

bb <- matrix(rnorm(100), ncol=5, nrow = 20)
k <- sample(1:3,20, replace = TRUE)
plotK(bb, k, idx = 3)
